DYAD: CHAD - RWANDA
RIVALRY: RIV1092
DISPUTE(S): MID4339

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180707
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181001

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4339

TERRMID: MID4339 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4339 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4339 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4339 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4339 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4339 1 -- civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4339 from Gibler 2018, this is the Second Congo War, a civil war in DRC. Chad provided support to the DRC against rebel forces trying to overthrow its government, while Rwanda invaded DRC, fought against the DRC forces, and helped the rebels. Coded civil war link because this was connected to civil war in DRC, outside this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID4339 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4339 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:

SOURCES-CR:
